title: Project management fundamentals education design applying constructive alignment

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Asynchronous class structures optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can create a 10-page project plan by applying fundamental project management principles (scope, time, cost, quality).
Learners can establish project schedules comprising five or more tasks using Gantt charts and the Critical Path Method (CPM).
Learners can propose three or more potential risk response strategies by applying risk management techniques in team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
